CustomField.formula: IF( EssentialsNotInstalled_MobilePay__c , "Mobile Pay;", "") + IF(CMCSecureAccess__c, "CMC/Secure Access;","") + IF(EssentialsNotInstalled_ASV__c, "ASV;","") + IF(EssentialsNotInstalled_AOO__c, "Digital Ordering;","")+ IF(CFC__c, "CFC;","") + IF(EssentialsNotInstalled_Pulse__c, "Pulse;","") + IF(EssentialsNotInstalled_Insight__c, "Insight;","") + IF(Consumer_Marketing__c, "Consumer Marketing;","") + IF(All_Products_installed__c, "All Products to be Installed;","")+IF(EssentialsNotInstalled_BSP_APIs__c, "BSP APIs;","") + Essential_Other__c
CustomField.label: Essentials Products that will NOT instal
